data.blogText: Exercise to be fit,not skinny, Eat to nourish your Body, And Always Ignore the haters,Doubters & unhealthy examples that were once feeding you You Are Worth More Than You Realize
Memories are Special Moments That Tells Our Story...Treasure your Moments And Make Them Count...

A baby daughter is always a Daddy’s girl and Mommy’s world...Like star dust glistening on fairies’ wings, little girls are made of magical things...No matter what the moment, a baby girl will always render sunshine in your life with her adorable smile...

Relax.Don't be so hard on yourself.You are living and learning,Forgive yourself and grow from the experience...Falling down is an accident.Staying down is a choice...The sun shines on everybody.You've got to keep believing...
To say it was a beautiful day would not begin to explain it.It was that day when the end of summer intersects perfectly with the start of fall...
